short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension to add GPT functionality to tweets.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Introducing TweetGenius, an innovative Chrome extension designed to supercharge your Twitter experience with cutting-edge GPT technology. This powerful tool seamlessly integrates with Twitter's interface, providing users with AI-generated suggestions to enrich their tweets and spark creativity.
